casebody.data:
APPEALS ALLOWED

01-1474. Hillyer v. State Farm Fire & Cas. Co.

Cuyahoga App. No. 79176. Discretionary appeal allowed and cause consolidated with 01-1867, Hillyer v. State Farm Fire & Cas. Co., Cuyahoga App. No. 79176; sua sponte, cause to be argued on the same date as 01-1786, Lemm v. The Hartford, Franklin App. No. 01AP-251.

F.E. Sweeney and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., dissent.
